Forward Modeling Tool for Spectral Analysis

Welcome to ForMoSA, an open-source Python package. Using a forward modeling approach, we designed this tool to model exoplanetary atmospheres. We encourage the community to exploit its capabilities!

Attribution:

When using ForMoSA please cite Petrus et al (2023).
